examination.findings_summary: Small, dark, pinpoint object visible under the skin surface of the plantar foot.

assessment.diagnosis: Foreign body (splinter) in the skin, right foot

plan: sterile removal of foreign body with tweezers
application of antibiotic ointment and bandage.
encounter.history_of_present_illness: Stepped on a small piece of glass or splinter in the foot two days ago, slight discomfort remains.
